nodes.text: Orflon was a frozen, uncharted asteroid located near the Demophon system. It was the location of Asteroid Base, the only permanent Alliance to Restore the Republic base near Demophon during the Galactic Civil War. It was so remote that it was not even inhabited by mynocks.

Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, confirmed during discussions about The Essential Atlas Online Companion that Orflon and other wandering stars/planets/asteroids were excluded from The Essential Atlas.
